name: Shields Tactics - Alpha Demo 0.1a
description:
Shields Chronicle Tactics

The story follow a young prince of Somnium Kingdom who is on his pilgrimage. As his journey about to end, a sudden event changes the course of not only the young prince's destiny, but also the fate of the Kingdom forever.

This game is a grid-based tactical game heavily inspired by the Final Fantasy Tactics series. I hope this can be a worthy love letter to both the fans of the genre and the OG FFT.

Lets sidetrack a little bit. I have had the idea for the world of SCT for a few years now, and I have try different ideas and game genres, but ultimately, the tactics genre fits its tone the best. More detail will be explained in the companion devlogs, which should be available as soon as I can upload those.

I hope you guys will be able to enjoy the game as I am enjoying making it.
